ProjectDescription: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. In fact it is this very website.
A personal (non-professional) website with basic info about me.
A couple of simple applications to send heart rate data to VRChat through OSC. Currently compatible with Polar (H10) HR monitors and Pulsoid.
A collection of useful scripts/tools I made. Might be useful to some, trash to others.
An "egg" to run AutoPlug on Pterodactyl. More or less inactive by now.
A tool specifically developed to watch for updates in displaynames of certain people on VRChat. This tool is private and a release will likely never happen.
A now archived project of mine.
A powerful anti adblock, which for obvious reasons will stay private. I do not plan on releasing this... Ever...
A VRChat moderation toolkit for an organization which alerts for bad users in an instance.
Private VRChat ban logger for my VRChat group.
Similar to the aforementioned toolkit but safer and more advanced. More focused towards group moderation and alerting of groups rather than individual users.
A simple but secure database server, used as a backend for things like the Companion App.
A straightforward, easy to use audio mixer (Like voicemeeter) I made for my partner. Not currently available for release, though contact me if interested.
A from-scratch Discord ticketing system originally designed for an organization, though it was never implemented due to issues within the team.
A time clock app which allows trial staff (On VRChat) to clock in and out. The app would send a webhook POST request to Discord, with corresponding timestamps.
I've made more things, though some of them I am unable to mention here.
